-spec maximum_length(S :: unicode:unicode_binary()) -> integer().
maximum_length(S) ->
    MaxLen = byte_size(S),
    Result = lists:foldl(fun(Len, Acc) ->
                             Count = lists:foldl(fun(Start, Acc1) ->
                                                     SubStr = binary:part(S, Start, Len),
                                                     C = length([1 || Other <- lists:seq(0, MaxLen - Len),
                                                                 Other =/= Start,
                                                                 SubStr == binary:part(S, Other, Len)]),
                                                     if C >= 2 -> Acc1 + 1; true -> Acc1 end
                                                 end, 0, lists:seq(0, MaxLen - Len)),
                             if Count > 0 -> [Len|Acc]; true -> Acc end
                         end, [], lists:seq(1, MaxLen)),
    case Result of
        [] -> -1;
        L -> lists:max(L)
    end.
